metadata.title: CVE-2022-2531 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab EE affecting all versions startingfrom 12.5 before 15.0.5, all versions starting from 15.1 before 15.1.4, allversions starting from 15.2 before 15.2.1. GitLab was not performingcorrect authentication on Grafana API under specific conditions allowingunauthenticated users to perform queries through a path traversalvulnerability.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
